print.io.analytics.impl

Class GoogleAnalyticsTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • print.io.analytics.impl.GoogleAnalyticsTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, AnalyticsTracker

    public class GoogleAnalyticsTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnalyticsTracker
    Default AnalyticsTracker implementation using Google Analytics service.
    Author:
    Vlado

    • Constructor Detail

      • GoogleAnalyticsTracker

        public GoogleAnalyticsTracker()
        Constructs new GoogleAnalyticsTracker. Google Analytics tracking ID must be set via setter method in order to have analytics enabled.

      • GoogleAnalyticsTracker

        public GoogleAnalyticsTracker(java.lang.String trackingId)
        Constructs new GoogleAnalyticsTracker with supplied Google Analytics tracking ID.
        Parameters:
        trackingId - The Google Analytics tracking ID. If value is set null tracking will be disabled.
